Hi everyone!

I've recently started playing Kerbal Space Program again after about a year, and playing on a new laptop with 4K (3840x2160), Kerbal Engineer Redux seems to be pretty small. The in-game UI is manageable, and I figured out how to change its size by changing the "UI_SCALE". Here is what it looks like:

Scaling down to 1920x1080 doesn't seem to do anything. Anybody else have any similar issues? Perhaps a settings file I can update or another addon? 

Thanks, Endosym
You can click on the edit button on any of those KER windows, choose the misc category, install the "GUI Size Adjustor", adjust the size and then uninstall it again or leave it there.
Sweet! Is there anyway to fine-tune the values to between 0 and 1?
